# oveRSAturation
## Description
I've encrypted the flag using RSA and given you everything you need to decrypt it. Can you retrieve the flag?

Important: You need to convert the flag to ASCII after you decrypt it.

## Analysis
We are given p, q, and d so we already have all we need to find the flag.

If you want to learn more about RSA and how to break it, a simplified wikipedia page is available [here](https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/RSA_algorithm).

## Solution
```py
from binascii import unhexlify

c = 
p = 
q = 
d = 

n = p*q

m = pow(c, d, n)
print(unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]).decode())
```

And out we get the flag:
```txt
CTFSG{n0w_1_kn0w_h0w_2_d3crypt_R54}
```
